content_fields.desc: **Required.** The type of rules used for users wishing to join this room. One of: ["public", "knock", "invite", "private"]
content_fields.title: enum

desc: A room may be ``public`` meaning anyone can join the room without any prior action. Alternatively, it can be ``invite`` meaning that a user who wishes to join the room must first receive an invite to the room from someone already inside of the room. Currently, ``knock`` and ``private`` are reserved keywords which are not implemented.
title: Describes how users are allowed to join the room.
